subject: Self Care
title: Finding Your Flow Activities
description: A fast breakdown of Finding Your Flow Activities for builders.

hook.text: She tried 12 hobbies before finding the one where time vanished. It was pottery. She never would have guessed that in advance.

buildup.text: Flow activities are personal. What absorbs one person bores another. You discover your flow channels through experimentation.

discovery.text: Common flow activities: writing, sports, music, coding, gardening, cooking, teaching. The thread is skill meeting challenge.

twist.text: Your flow activity might not be your career. That's fine. A rich life includes flow outside of work too. Hobbies count deeply.

climax.text: List activities where you lose track of time. Those are your flow zones. Schedule at least one flow session per week. Guard it.

punchline.text: Find where time disappears. Schedule it weekly. Guard it fiercely.

quiz.question: How do you discover your personal flow activities?
